title: Who is Coming to Our House?
description: A modern Christmas classic about how the animals prepare a cozy welcome for the baby Jesus, perfect for under the tree or in stockings."Who is coming to our house?Someone, someone," says Mouse.As Pig makes room, Lamb cleans up, Goose stacks the hay, and Duck lines the crib with eiderdown, Mary and Joseph are on their way by donkey. All the animals are eager to welcome the baby Jesus to their home. A warm, lyrical book your family will cuddle up with for years.
author: Joseph Slate
